00023 template<typename T> T GetUserData(const NewtonBody* body)
00024 {
00025     NewtonNode* nn = static_cast<NewtonNode*>(NewtonBodyGetUserData(body));
00026     return dynamic_cast<T>(nn);
00027 }
00028 
00029 template<typename T> T GetParentUserData(const NewtonBody* body)
00030 {
00031     NewtonNode* nn = static_cast<NewtonNode*>(NewtonBodyGetUserData(body));
00032     return dynamic_cast<T>(nn->GetParent());
00033 }
00034 
00035 void PlayerOnStaticContactsProcess(const NewtonJoint* contact, dFloat timestep, int threadIndex)
00036 {
00037     NewtonBody* body0 = NewtonJointGetBody0(contact);
00038     NewtonBody* body1 = NewtonJointGetBody1(contact);
00039 
00040     int group0 = NewtonBodyGetMaterialGroupID(body0);
00041     int group1 = NewtonBodyGetMaterialGroupID(body1);
00042 
00043     if(group0 == group1)
00044         return;
00045 
00046     NewtonWorld* nWorld = NewtonBodyGetWorld(body0);
00047     GameManager* gameManager = static_cast<GameManager*>(NewtonMaterialGetUserData(nWorld, group0, group1));
00048     int playerGroup = gameManager->manager.material->GetPlayersGroupe();
00049 
00050     Player* player = NULL;
00051     NewtonNode* obj = NULL;
00052 
00053     if(group0 == playerGroup)
00054     {
00055         player = GetParentUserData<Player*>(body0);
00056         obj = GetParentUserData<NewtonNode*>(body1);
00057     }
00058 
00059     else if(group1 == playerGroup)
00060     {
00061         player = GetParentUserData<Player*>(body1);
00062         obj = GetParentUserData<NewtonNode*>(body0);
00063     }
00064 }
00065 
00066 void PlayerOnDynamicContactsProcess(const NewtonJoint* contact, dFloat, int)
00067 {
00068     NewtonBody* body0 = NewtonJointGetBody0(contact);
00069     NewtonBody* body1 = NewtonJointGetBody1(contact);
00070 
00071     int group0 = NewtonBodyGetMaterialGroupID(body0);
00072     int group1 = NewtonBodyGetMaterialGroupID(body1);
00073 
00074     if(group0 == group1)
00075         return;
00076 
00077     NewtonWorld* nWorld = NewtonBodyGetWorld(body0);
00078     GameManager* gameManager = static_cast<GameManager*>(NewtonMaterialGetUserData(nWorld, group0, group1));
00079     int playerGroup = gameManager->manager.material->GetPlayersGroupe();
00080 
00081     Player* player = NULL;
00082     DynamicObject* obj = NULL;
00083 
00084     if(group0 == playerGroup)
00085     {
00086         obj = GetParentUserData<DynamicObject*>(body1);
00087         player = GetParentUserData<Player*>(body0);
00088     }
00089 
00090     else if(group1 == playerGroup)
00091     {
00092         obj = GetParentUserData<DynamicObject*>(body0);
00093         player = GetParentUserData<Player*>(body1);
00094     }
00095 
00096     obj->InteractWith(player);
00097 }

00099 int PlayerOnItemsAABBOverlape(const NewtonMaterial* material, const NewtonBody* body0, const NewtonBody* body1, int)
00100 {
00101     int group0 = NewtonBodyGetMaterialGroupID(body0);
00102     int group1 = NewtonBodyGetMaterialGroupID(body1);
00103 
00104     if(group0 == group1)
00105         return 0;
00106 
00107     Player* player = NULL;
00108     Item* item = NULL;
00109 
00110     NewtonWorld* nWorld = NewtonBodyGetWorld(body0);
00111     GameManager* gameManager = static_cast<GameManager*>(NewtonMaterialGetUserData(nWorld, group0, group1));
00112     int itemGroup = gameManager->manager.material->GetItemGroupe();
00113 
00114     if(group0 == itemGroup)
00115     {
00116         item = GetParentUserData<Item*>(body0);
00117         player = GetParentUserData<Player*>(body1);
00118     }
00119 
00120     else if(group1 == itemGroup)
00121     {
00122         item = GetParentUserData<Item*>(body1);
00123         player = GetParentUserData<Player*>(body0);
00124     }
00125 
00126     player->AttachItem(item);
00127 
00128     return 0;
00129 }

00131 void BulletOnMapContactsProcess(const NewtonJoint* contact, dFloat, int)
00132 {
00133     NewtonBody* body0 = NewtonJointGetBody0(contact);
00134     NewtonBody* body1 = NewtonJointGetBody1(contact);
00135 
00136     int group0 = NewtonBodyGetMaterialGroupID(body0);
00137     int group1 = NewtonBodyGetMaterialGroupID(body1);
00138 
00139     if(group0 == group1)
00140         return;
00141 
00142     NewtonWorld* nWorld = NewtonBodyGetWorld(body0);
00143     GameManager* gameManager = static_cast<GameManager*>(NewtonMaterialGetUserData(nWorld, group0, group1));
00144     int weaponGroup = gameManager->manager.material->GetWeaponsGroupe();
00145 
00146     Bullet* bullet = NULL;
00147 
00148     if(group0 == weaponGroup)
00149         bullet = GetUserData<Bullet*>(body0);
00150 
00151     else if(group1 == weaponGroup)
00152         bullet = GetUserData<Bullet*>(body1);
00153 
00154     bullet->SetLife(0);
00155 }

00157 int BulletOnPlayerAABBOverlape(const NewtonMaterial* material, const NewtonBody* body0, const NewtonBody* body1, int)
00158 {
00159     static tbe::ticks::Clock cheerClock;
00160     static int cheerCount = 0;
00161 
00162     int group0 = NewtonBodyGetMaterialGroupID(body0);
00163     int group1 = NewtonBodyGetMaterialGroupID(body1);
00164 
00165     if(group0 == group1)
00166         return 0;
00167 
00168     Player* striker = NULL;
00169     Player* striked = NULL;
00170     Bullet* bullet = NULL;
00171 
00172     NewtonWorld* nWorld = NewtonBodyGetWorld(body0);
00173     GameManager* gameManager = static_cast<GameManager*>(NewtonMaterialGetUserData(nWorld, group0, group1));
00174     int weaponGroup = gameManager->manager.material->GetWeaponsGroupe();
00175 
00176     if(group0 == weaponGroup)
00177     {
00178         striked = GetParentUserData<Player*>(body1);
00179         bullet = GetUserData<Bullet*>(body0);
00180     }
00181 
00182     else if(group1 == weaponGroup)
00183     {
00184         striked = GetParentUserData<Player*>(body0);
00185         bullet = GetUserData<Bullet*>(body1);
00186     }
00187 
00188     striker = bullet->GetWeapon()->GetShooter();
00189     PlayManager* playManager = striker->GetPlayManager();
00190 
00191     if(striked == striker)
00192         return 0;
00193 
00194     striked->TakeDammage(bullet);
00195 
00196     bullet->SetLife(0);
00197 
00198     if(striker == playManager->GetUserPlayer() && striked->IsKilled())
00199     {
00200         cheerCount++;
00201 
00202         if(cheerCount >= 2)
00203         {
00204             if(!cheerClock.IsEsplanedTime(4000))
00205                 switch(cheerCount)
00206                 {
00207                     case 2: playManager->Log("Double kill");
00208                         break;
00209                     case 3: playManager->Log("Triple kill");
00210                         break;
00211                     case 4: playManager->Log("Carnage");
00212                         break;
00213                     case 5: playManager->Log("The One");
00214                         break;
00215                     case 6: playManager->Log("War Warrior");
00216                         break;
00217                     case 7: playManager->Log("God Of War !!!");
00218                         break;
00219                     default: playManager->Log("...");
00220                         break;
00221                 }
00222             else
00223                 cheerCount = 0;
00224 
00225             cheerClock.SnapShoot();
00226         }
00227     }
00228 
00229     return 0;
00230 }
00231 
00232 MaterialManager::MaterialManager(GameManager * gameManager)
00233 {
00234     m_gameManager = gameManager;
00235 
00236     m_world = m_gameManager->parallelscene.newton->GetNewtonWorld();
00237 
00238     Settings::World& worldSettings = m_gameManager->worldSettings;
00239 
00240     m_bulletGroupe = NewtonMaterialCreateGroupID(m_world);
00241     m_playersGroupe = NewtonMaterialCreateGroupID(m_world);
00242     m_itemGroupe = NewtonMaterialCreateGroupID(m_world);
00243     m_staticGroupe = NewtonMaterialCreateGroupID(m_world);
00244     m_dynamicGroupe = NewtonMaterialCreateGroupID(m_world);
00245     m_ghostGroupe = NewtonMaterialCreateGroupID(m_world);
00246 
00247     NewtonMaterialSetCollisionCallback(m_world, m_playersGroupe, m_dynamicGroupe, m_gameManager, 0, PlayerOnDynamicContactsProcess);
00248     //    NewtonMaterialSetCollisionCallback(m_world, m_playersGroupe, m_staticGroupe, 0, 0, PlayerOnStaticContactsProcess);
00249 
00250     NewtonMaterialSetCollisionCallback(m_world, m_playersGroupe, m_itemGroupe, m_gameManager, PlayerOnItemsAABBOverlape, 0);
00251 
00252     NewtonMaterialSetCollisionCallback(m_world, m_bulletGroupe, m_dynamicGroupe, m_gameManager, 0, BulletOnMapContactsProcess);
00253     NewtonMaterialSetCollisionCallback(m_world, m_bulletGroupe, m_staticGroupe, m_gameManager, 0, BulletOnMapContactsProcess);
00254     NewtonMaterialSetCollisionCallback(m_world, m_bulletGroupe, m_itemGroupe, m_gameManager, 0, BulletOnMapContactsProcess);
00255     NewtonMaterialSetCollisionCallback(m_world, m_bulletGroupe, m_bulletGroupe, m_gameManager, BulletOnPlayerAABBOverlape, 0);
00256     NewtonMaterialSetCollisionCallback(m_world, m_bulletGroupe, m_playersGroupe, m_gameManager, BulletOnPlayerAABBOverlape, 0);
00257 
00258     NewtonMaterialSetDefaultFriction(m_world, m_playersGroupe, m_staticGroupe, worldSettings.staticFriction, worldSettings.keniticFriction);
00259 
00260     NewtonMaterialSetDefaultCollidable(m_world, m_ghostGroupe, m_bulletGroupe, false);
00261     NewtonMaterialSetDefaultCollidable(m_world, m_ghostGroupe, m_playersGroupe, false);
00262     NewtonMaterialSetDefaultCollidable(m_world, m_ghostGroupe, m_itemGroupe, false);
00263     NewtonMaterialSetDefaultCollidable(m_world, m_ghostGroupe, m_staticGroupe, false);
00264     NewtonMaterialSetDefaultCollidable(m_world, m_ghostGroupe, m_dynamicGroupe, false);
00265 
00266     //    NewtonMaterialSetDefaultCollidable(m_world, m_bulletGroupe, m_itemGroupe, false);
00267 }
00268 
00269 MaterialManager::~MaterialManager()
00270 {
00271     NewtonMaterialDestroyAllGroupID(m_world);
00272 }

00274 void MaterialManager::SetGhost(Object* body, bool state)
00275 {
00276     NewtonNode* xbody = body->GetPhysicBody();
00277 
00278     if(state)
00279     {
00280         if(m_ghostState.count(xbody))
00281             return;
00282 
00283         int newtonMaterial = NewtonBodyGetMaterialGroupID(xbody->GetBody());
00284         m_ghostState[xbody] = newtonMaterial;
00285         NewtonBodySetMaterialGroupID(xbody->GetBody(), m_ghostGroupe);
00286     }
00287 
00288     else
00289     {
00290         if(!m_ghostState.count(xbody))
00291             return;
00292 
00293         NewtonBodySetMaterialGroupID(xbody->GetBody(), m_ghostState[xbody]);
00294         m_ghostState.erase(xbody);
00295     }
00296 }

00299 {

00301 }
